Producer: BJ Davis, Kimberley Kates, John Asher, Jenny McCarthy
Synopsis: The klutzy yet stunning Rebecca Sommers (Jenny McCarthy) walks in on her hunky boyfriend in bed with another woman. They break up and Rebecca starts to fall apart, but, with the help of her close girlfriends, she begins to date again. Unfortunately, the men she meets all happen to be crazy. John (Eddie Kaye Thomas), her dorky guy friend, tries to express his secret love for Rebecca, but she's too busy to notice as she tries to come to terms with her breakup.
Title: Dirty Love
